welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Williamsport, a charming city known for its small-town charm and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our beautiful city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lycoming County Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Lycoming County Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at W T Piper Memorial Airport serves all commercial flights and includes a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at W T Piper Memorial Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering a more exclusive and personalized travel experience.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Penn Valley Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Penn Valley Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers to use.
